document.full_text: former french rock star bertrand cantat has landed a controversial live theater gig in montreal after serving four years in prison for the 2003 beating death of his actress girlfriend.
document.title: killer rock star gets canadian stage gig
lines_and_colors: former french rock star bertrand cantat has landed a controversial live theater gig in montreal after serving four years in prison for the 2003 beating death of his actress girlfriend.
